# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new instance from a decoder.

## Declaration

```swift
required init(from decoder: any Decoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **decoder**: The decoder to read data from.

## Discussion

Throws an error if reading from `decoder` fails, or if the data is corrupted or otherwise invalid.

## Serializing tokens

- **encode(to:)**: Writes the token’s data into an encoder.

items.description: Writes the token’s data into an encoder.
items.name: encode(to:)
